distsql-case.value: DROP RESOURCE ds_0,ds_1
DROP RESOURCE IF EXISTS ds_0,ds_1
DROP RESOURCE ds_0,ds_1 ignore single tables;
DROP SHARDING TABLE RULE t_order,t_order_item
DROP SHARDING TABLE RULE IF EXISTS t_order,t_order_item
DROP SHARDING BINDING TABLE RULES
DROP SHARDING BINDING TABLE RULES (t_1,t_2)
DROP SHARDING BINDING TABLE RULES IF EXISTS (t_1,t_2)
DROP SHARDING BROADCAST TABLE RULES
DROP SHARDING BROADCAST TABLE RULES t_order
DROP SHARDING BROADCAST TABLE RULES IF EXISTS t_order
DROP READWRITE_SPLITTING RULE ms_group_0,ms_group_1
DROP READWRITE_SPLITTING RULE IF EXISTS ms_group_0,ms_group_1
DROP DB_DISCOVERY RULE ha_group_0,ha_group_1
DROP DB_DISCOVERY RULE IF EXISTS ha_group_0,ha_group_1
DROP DB_DISCOVERY TYPE type_name_0,type_name_1
DROP DB_DISCOVERY TYPE IF EXISTS type_name_0,type_name_1
DROP DB_DISCOVERY HEARTBEAT heartbeat_name_0,heartbeat_name_1
DROP DB_DISCOVERY HEARTBEAT IF EXISTS heartbeat_name_0,heartbeat_name_1
DROP ENCRYPT RULE t_encrypt,t_encrypt_order
DROP ENCRYPT RULE IF EXISTS t_encrypt,t_encrypt_order
DROP SHADOW RULE shadow_rule_1,shadow_rule_2
DROP SHADOW RULE IF EXISTS shadow_rule_1,shadow_rule_2
DROP SHADOW algorithm shadow_algorithm_1,shadow_algorithm_2
DROP DEFAULT SHADOW ALGORITHM IF EXISTS
DROP SHADOW ALGORITHM IF EXISTS shadow_algorithm_1,shadow_algorithm_2
DROP DEFAULT SINGLE TABLE RULE
DROP DEFAULT SINGLE TABLE RULE IF EXISTS
DROP SHARDING KEY GENERATOR uuid_key_generator
DROP SHARDING KEY GENERATOR IF EXISTS uuid_key_generator
DROP DEFAULT SHARDING TABLE STRATEGY
DROP DEFAULT SHARDING TABLE STRATEGY IF EXISTS
DROP SHARDING SCALING RULE default_scaling
DROP SHARDING SCALING RULE IF EXISTS default_scaling
DROP SHARDING ALGORITHM IF EXISTS t_order_hash_mod
